meta.title: NameCraft AI: Free Chinese, English, and Japanese Name Generator for Everyone
meta.description: Generate perfect names in English, Japanese, and Chinese with our AI-powered name generator. Create unique, culturally appropriate names with handwriting and pronunciation features.

hero.title: Create Perfect Names in Multiple Languages
hero.subtitle: Generate unique, culturally appropriate names for characters, babies, or businesses in English, Chinese, and Japanese.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to generate the perfect name

multiLanguage.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguage.description: Generate names in English, Chinese, and Japanese with cultural authenticity.

customizable.title: Customizable Options
customizable.description: Choose gender, style, and other parameters to create the perfect name.

batchGeneration.title: Batch Generation
batchGeneration.description: Generate multiple unique names at once, perfect for character lists or naming ideas.
